item.title: Metamorphic Rocks and Beyond Symposium 2025 (2025 変成岩などシンポジウム 青葉山大会)
item.description:
Date and Venue

Date: March 12-14, 2025 | Calendar

Venue: Tohoku University - Aobayama Campus

  • Aoba Science Hall (H-04 Science Complex C, 2nd Floor) | 東北大学青葉山キャンパス 理学研究科合同Ｃ棟 2階, Tohoku University; Map: 6-3 Aramaki Aza Aoba, Aoba-ku, Sendai, Miyagi, 980-0845 Japan

  • Access from Sendai Airport: Take the Airport Access Line to ‘JR Sendai Station’ | JR仙台駅. From there, use the Subway Tōzai Line from T07 ‘Sendai’ to T02 ‘Aobayama’ Station | 青葉山駅

  • Access from ‘JR Sendai Station’ | JR仙台駅: Take the Subway Tōzai Line from T07 ‘Sendai’ to T02 ‘Aobayama’ Station | 青葉山駅
